reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress gorgeous with vintage vibes, comfortable, and perfect for western-themed parties. They appreciate its stretchiness, softness, and versatility, noting it can be dressed up or down. The fit receives mixed feedback - while some say it fits great, others mention it runs a bit tight around the neck. I also ordered a small and it fit fine but it was a good 10â€ shorter and had no slit! Iâ€™d definitely recommend the dress! Really good quality, very soft and stretchy Read more
items.author: Libby Bays

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute
items.body: I love the mesh material of this dress, and the neckline and cut of this dress is so flattering. The leg slit is really subtle but sexy. The length is also perfect which makes me happy because usually things are way too long on me. My only complaint is the print is a little digital and cheap looking Read more
items.author: Karla Marie Swift

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE LOVE LOVE!!

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elegant vintage vibes, gorgeous!
items.body: Love this dress! Felt like a perfect fit. Iâ€™m 5â€™4â€™ and it was about ankle length. Wore it to my nieces wedding and felt elegant! I was able to wear a black bra under it and it looked like it was part of the dress. Iâ€™m still on the lookout for a good strapless thatâ€™s comfortable. Love the vintage vibes, while being elegant. I purchase the medium and Iâ€™m typically a size 10 in dresses or jeans. Canâ€™t speak on washability yet but it seems delicate, and I plan to hand wash and hang dry. Read more

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Short Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Short Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Blue, Purple, Black, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
